basic.description: A full-year research project on a topic in chemistry, supervised by a member of staff. Normally limited to students in the final year of a major or subject of specialization concentration in Chemistry. May be taken in the Summer Term with permission. Additional restrictions may apply.
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Research Project

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     CHEM397
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from CHEM497; CHEM498; CHEM499
